name: Crazy BFF PJ Party
description:
~~> Pillows, Snowflakes, slippers, and hot cocoa & cakes too! It's a PJ party and we're inviting you!
~~> PILLOW FIGHT FRENZY! Have a blast as you toss pillows at your besties and have a crazy good time!
~~> Plan the party of your dreams! Decorate invitations, design your own pillows, dress your cute PJs and enjoy the sweet desserts and so much more!

You are invited to a crazy PJ party. Stay up all night with your best friends sharing secrets, laughing & dancing to your favorite songs! Show off your PJ Party style with the most awesome PJs. It’s gonna be a total blast!

TONS of slumber party activities:
> Design and decorate your invitation with adorable stickers!
> Make the perfect pillow - cut, sew and stuff it! Design with so many colors and draw in your style.
> Dress up for the party! And help your friends to get dressed.
> Decorate the party room in so many colorful balloons and brand new furniture.
> Ready to have a crazy pillow fight, Hope you are full of energy.
> Get some food to have a rest. Cake, cookies, hot chocolate,and the unicorn food.
> Share secret with friends and have all night fun.
